mapper.select: select book.*, group_concat(wr_name separator ' | ') as bk_writer from book join writer_list on bk_num = wl_bk_num join writer on wr_num = wl_wr_num where bk_num = #{bookNum}

select count(*) from book where bk_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') and
bk_state = '국내도서'
bk_state = '해외도서'
(bk_state ='국내도서' or bk_state = '해외도서')
and bk_sg_num = #{genre}

select * from book order by
bk_totalPurchase desc
bk_date desc
bk_totalPurchase desc
bk_price desc
bk_price asc
bk_score desc
bk_reviewCount desc
where
bk_state ='국내도서' and
bk_state = '해외도서' and
bk_date >=date_sub(now(),interval 1 year); and
bk_sg_num = #{pm.cri.genre}
bk_name like concat('%',#{pm.cri.search}, '%')
limit #{pm.cri.pageStart}, #{pm.cri.perPageNum}
select count(*) from review where re_me_id = #{userId}
select * from review join member on me_id = re_me_id where re_bk_num = #{bookNum} order by re_date asc limit #{pageNum}, 5

select book.*, group_concat(wr_name separator ' | ') as bk_writer from book join writer_list on bk_num = wl_bk_num join writer on wr_num = wl_wr_num group by bk_num order by bk_totalPurchase desc limit 3
select book.*, group_concat(wr_name separator ' | ') as bk_writer from book join writer_list on bk_num = wl_bk_num join writer on wr_num = wl_wr_num group by bk_num order by bk_date desc limit 3
mapper.delete: delete from review where re_bk_num = #{bookNum} and re_me_id = #{id}
